mapper.select:
select distinct(r1.menu_id) as menuId, r1.name ,r1.parent_id as parentId , r1.url , r1.type, r1.create_time as createTime, r1.update_time as updateTime, r1.remark ,r1.is_show as isShow ,r1.parent_name as parentName from sys_menu as r1 left join sys_menu as r2 on r2.menu_id = r1.parent_id where r1.is_delete = 0
and r1.menu_id like '%${menuId}%'
and r1.name like '%${name}%'
limit #{page.firstIndex}, #{page.lastIndex}
select menu_id as menuId ,name from sys_menu where is_delete = 0 and parent_id=#{parentId}
select res_id from sys_resources where parent_id = 0 and is_delete = 0
select * from sys_resources where menu_id = #{menuId} and is_delete= 0

select count(*) from sys_resources where is_delete = 0
and menu_id like '%${menuId}%'
and name like '%${name}%'
limit #{page.firstIndex}, #{page.lastIndex}
select * from sys_resources where is_delete = 0 and parent_id=#{menuId}

select DISTINCT(t1.menu_id) as menuId,t1.parent_id as parentId ,t1.name ,t1.icon,t3.menu_id as selectedId from sys_resources t1 left join sys_resources t2 on t1.parent_id = t2.res_id left join sys_role_res t3 on t1.res_id = t3.res_id and t3.role_id= #{roleId}
select * from sys_resources where res_id in( select res_id from sys_role where role_id in ( select role_id from sys_user_role where user_id=(select user_id from sys_user where account =#{account}) )
mapper.delete: delete from sys_resources where is_delete = 0 and menu_id = #{menuId}
